1.2.2.name: wordpress/dutch-auction-masters
1.2.2.description:
This plugin enables you the ability to build your professional online auctioning website by only a few clicks. It contains 2 widgets and short tag which make you the easiest way to do it.

Dutch auction masters dedicates on making exciting online auctioning websites. For more information please visit our website: http://www.dutchauctionmasters.nl/

Features

Dutch auction masters Has the Following Features:

-　Independent auction plug-in. -　Real-time auction bidding process. -　Integrated WordPress user login module. -　Widgets supported. -　Short code supported. -　Easy to integrate original systems. -　Ajax more items paging. -　Integrated WordPress media management.

For more information, visit the Dutch auction masters plugin page.
